title: Senior 3D Frontend Developer
description:
Formify: where imagination becomes live and interactive! We're on a mission to revolutionize the world of 3D visualization software with our cutting-edge, web-based platform that brings products, cabinetry, and customized apartments to life in real-time.


At Formify, we're not just creating a SaaS product, we are optimizing the users experience by redefining how people experience and interact with 3D visualizations. Our live rendering technology takes you on a journey into a world where creativity knows no bounds. Whether you're a seasoned designer, a tech enthusiast, or someone who simply appreciates the beauty of customization, we have a place for you on our team.


We are seeking a talented and motivated Senior 3D Frontend Developer to join our passionate team on an initial 12 month B2B contract. As a Senior 3D Frontend Developer at Formify, you will play a key role in shaping the user interface and overall user experience of our platform. This position will be hired primarily on a remote contractor basis.



Roles and Responsibilities:

  • Collaborate with product managers, UX/UI designers, and backend developers to implement visually appealing and intuitive user interfaces.
  • Creating the 3D preview and architecture of the Next.js / Three.js application.
  • Translate design wireframes and prototypes into high-quality, responsive web applications.
  • Develop and maintain reusable code components and libraries for future use.
  • Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability.
  • Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and best practices to continuously enhance our frontend development processes.
  • Troubleshoot and debug issues, ensuring a seamless user experience across various browsers and devices.


Requirements:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field, or equivalent practical experience.
  • A degree specialising in, or experience with Computer Graphics would be an advantage.
  • 5+ years proven experience as a Frontend Developer, with a strong portfolio showcasing your work.
  • Experience with Object Oriented Programming.
  • Experience implementing 3D assets in frontend environments and optimising for performance.
  • Proficiency in JavaScript, Typescript and modern frontend frameworks (e.g., React, Angular, Vue.js).
  • Experience with RESTful APIs and integration of third-party libraries.
  • Strong understanding of UI/UX principles and best practices.
  • Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git).
  • Excellent problem-solving and communication skills.
  • Solution-oriented thinker who thrives working in a fast-paced, agile environment.
  • Can work on own initiative; self-motivated with strong follow-through.
  • Has a start-up mindset, must be excited about our vision and eager to be a key player in the growth of our business.




Why join us at Formify?


Innovation at its Core: We're not following trends; we're setting them. Our team is driven by an insatiable curiosity and a passion for pushing the boundaries of what's possible in 3D visualization.

Endless Creative Opportunities : Imagine being part of a company where your work allows users to create, customize, and visualize their dream apartments, furniture, and more in real-time. Your contribution will be at the forefront of making dreams a reality.

Collaboration and Growth : We foster a collaborative and inclusive environment where diverse perspectives are celebrated. You'll work with a talented team of like-minded professionals who are committed to pushing the limits of technology: interacting daily with C level executives.

Impact : Your work will have a real-world impact on industries like interior design, architecture, and e-commerce. You'll be contributing to the tools that help our clients bring their ideas to life.

Continuous Learning : In a fast-paced, ever-evolving industry, we believe in continuous learning and development. You'll have access to resources and opportunities to keep your skills sharp and your knowledge up-to-date.

Flexibility : We understand that life is not just about work. We offer flexible working arrangements.

If you're a visionary, a dreamer, a creative thinker, or a tech wizard with a passion for transforming the way people visualize and create, we want you on our team. Join us at Formify and let's shape the future of 3D visualization together. Your journey starts here.



Formify is an equal-opportunity employer committed to fostering an inclusive working environment. We encourage all interested applicants to reach out, regardless of whether their experience matches perfectly, their background, and other factors protected by law.

title: Sap Finance Control Consultant - Accounting
description:
We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced SAP Accounting Expert (FICO) with a strong focus on Brazil-specific financial processes to join our team. You will play a crucial role in designing, configuring, and implementing our record-to-report (RTR) processes within our S/4HANA system.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Gather and thoroughly understand current business requirements and document them effectively.
  • Design, configure, and implement the Record to Report (RTR) processes within the S/4HANA system.
  • Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration with other SAP processes, including Procure to Pay (PTP), Order to Cash (OTC), Transportation Management (TM), and Tax.
  • Work with the Finance Systems team to provide robust solution designs, execute comprehensive testing, and maintain thorough documentation.
  • Prepare Functional Specification Documents (FSDs) and coordinate effectively with technical teams on WRICEF (Workflows, Reports, Interfaces, Conversions, Enhancements, Forms) development.
  • Lead the migration of accounting data from various ERP and non-ERP systems to S/4HANA.


Required Skills:

  • SAP FI (Financial Accounting) Expertise: In-depth knowledge and hands-on experience with SAP FI modules.
  • Asset Accounting: Strong understanding and experience with SAP Asset Accounting.
  • Tax: Solid grasp of tax-related configurations and processes within SAP, particularly for Brazil.
  • Excellent Communication Skills: Ability to articulate complex technical concepts clearly to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
  • Team Player: Proven ability to collaborate effectively within a team environment.


Requirements:

  • Demonstrable experience with S/4HANA Green Field and Brown Field implementations as well as rollout projects.
  • Project experience spanning LATAM and EMEA regions , with a strong preference for Brazil-specific implementation experience.
  • Proven track record of implementing country-specific requirements within SAP.
  • English - Mandatory: Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English are required.
  • Portuguese - Native: Native proficiency in Portuguese (speaking and writing) is essential for this Brazil-focused role.

title: Consultor Sênior de SAP TM – Embedded e Sidecar
description:
A Softtek está em busca de Consultor Sênior de SAP TM – Embedded e Sidecar para fazer parte do nosso quadro de colaboradores apoiando um de nossos grandes clientes.


Conhecimentos/Experiências que o profissional precisa ter:

  • Conhecimentos em: SAP S/4HANA TM, SAP TM 9.6, SAP ECC, SAP S/4HANA Core, SAP ABAP, Collaboration Portal e LBN (Logistics Business Network).
  • Experiência com dados mestres no SAP TM.
  • Vivência na gestão de pedidos SO/PO/STO para os processos P2P (Procure-to-Pay) e OTC (Order-to-Cash) .
  • Experiência em planejamento automático e manual, acordos de frete, cálculos de tarifas e liquidação de frete.
  • Integrações PI/PO entre SAP TM e S/4HANA.

Responsabilidades

  • Monitorar, analisar e resolver incidentes e solicitações de serviço relacionadas ao módulo SAP TM.
  • Investigar e solucionar problemas de configuração do sistema, integração e fluxos de dados.
  • Garantir a resolução rápida de problemas relatados por usuários e correções de falhas do sistema.
  • Realizar manutenção de rotina no sistema, incluindo atualizações, ajustes de configuração e otimização de desempenho.
  • Apoiar testes e implementação de upgrades, correções (patches) e melhorias no sistema.
  • Assegurar a documentação adequada das configurações e mudanças no sistema.

Suporte ao Usuário e Treinamento

  • Atuar como ponto de contato principal para os usuários finais, oferecendo orientação sobre funcionalidades do SAP TM e melhores práticas.
  • Conduzir treinamentos e produzir documentação de usuário para aumentar a eficiência e autonomia dos usuários.
  • Coletar feedback dos usuários e sugerir melhorias no sistema.

Colaboração com Equipes

  • Trabalhar em conjunto com as áreas de negócio para entender os requisitos operacionais e garantir o alinhamento do sistema.
  • Coordenar com as equipes funcionais e técnicas de SAP para suporte e integração entre módulos.
  • Apoiar na escalada de incidentes para a SAP ou fornecedores externos, quando necessário.

Relatórios e Análises

  • Gerar e analisar relatórios do sistema para monitorar o desempenho e o uso.
  • Identificar padrões de problemas recorrentes e propor ações preventivas.
  • Fornecer atualizações regulares e relatórios de status à gestão e demais partes interessadas.

Idiomas Necessários:

Tempo de alocação: Indeterminado

A Softtek valoriza a diversidade e inclusão em sua força de trabalho. A empresa tem uma equipe global com pessoas de diferentes origens e culturas, o que torna o ambiente de trabalho mais rico e interessante.

Independentemente da sua ,etnia, idade, gênero, orientação sexual, deficiência, credo ou convicção política, o que importa são as suas competências e habilidades para fazer acontecer.


Os Softtekians são seres humanos talentosos e auto-determinados que se consideram pessoas loucamente incríveis! Venha fazer parte desse time!!!


Quer saber mais? Acesse:


Sobre a Softtek:

Fundada em 1982, a Softtek é uma fornecedora global de soluções de TI orientadas a processos com 30 escritórios na América do Norte, América Latina, Europa e Ásia. Com 15 centros de entrega global nos EUA, México, China, Brasil, Argentina, Costa Rica, Espanha, Hungria e Índia, a Softtek ajuda a melhorar e produzir resultados previsíveis para corporações de primeira linha em mais de 20 países. A Softtek é a criadora e líder da indústria nearshore.

title: Workato Integration Architect
description:
About Us:

API People is a leading innovator in fintech, healthcare, and beyond. We are committed to delivering exceptional service to our clients while using cutting-edge technology to enhance business operations. We are currently looking for a highly skilled and motivated Workato Consultant to join our team.



Position Overview: We are seeking an experienced Integration Architect to join our team and play a critical role in designing and delivering sophisticated integration solutions for our clients. The ideal candidate will bring extensive experience in the Workato platform, as well as a broad understanding of integration technologies, iPaaS solutions, and enterprise architecture principles. This role involves significant client interaction, including supporting sales processes, conducting discovery sessions, gathering detailed requirements, and providing guidance throughout the development lifecycle.

Responsibilities:

  • Lead client-facing discovery sessions to identify integration needs, system requirements, and business objectives.
  • Develop comprehensive integration strategies and architectural blueprints aligned with clients' business goals and technology environments.
  • Provide expert-level Workato solution design, leveraging best practices and ensuring scalability, maintainability, and security.
  • Generate detailed integration requirements documentation, including process flows, data mappings, and technical specifications.
  • Collaborate with sales teams to support pre-sales efforts, providing technical expertise, solution demonstrations, and responding to RFPs.
  • Act as a technical advisor to clients, guiding them through best practices, platform capabilities, and integration patterns.
  • Support development teams during implementation, offering architectural oversight, performing code reviews, and ensuring adherence to standards.
  • Participate in quality assurance and user acceptance testing (UAT) activities, ensuring delivered integrations meet requirements and quality expectations.
  • Stay updated on the latest trends, updates, and advancements in Workato, iPaaS platforms, and related integration technologies.
  • Provide mentorship and knowledge transfer to internal teams, elevating overall integration architecture capabilities.

Qualifications:

  • Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, Engineering, or related field.
  • Minimum of 10 years of professional experience in integration technologies, iPaaS platforms, middleware solutions, and API management like Workato, Boomi and Mulesoft.
  • At least 5 years of dedicated experience architecting, designing, and implementing integrations on the Workato platform.
  • Proven expertise in API development, REST/SOAP services, JSON, XML, and other data interchange formats.
  • Solid understanding of integration patterns, including batch, real-time, asynchronous messaging, event-driven architecture, and hybrid cloud solutions.
  • Demonstrated experience in enterprise integration, data governance, security, and compliance best practices.
  • Strong technical proficiency with related integration tools and platforms such as Workato MuleSoft, Boomi, AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud Platform.
  • Exceptional client-facing and communication skills, capable of effectively engaging with stakeholders at all organizational levels.
  • Ability to translate complex technical requirements into clear, actionable specifications and architectural diagrams.
  • Experience supporting pre-sales activities, including presenting technical solutions, leading client workshops, and managing discovery processes.
  • Self-motivated and proactive, with strong problem-solving capabilities and a detail-oriented approach.

Preferred Qualifications:

  • Relevant certifications in Workato and/or enterprise architecture frameworks.
  • Experience in consulting or professional services environments.
  • Knowledge of DevOps, CI/CD processes, and Agile methodologies.



Benefits:

  • Competitive salary
  • Professional development and training opportunities
  • Flexible work environment (remote)



How to Apply:

To apply, please submit your resume and a cover letter detailing your experience and why you would be a great fit for this role to

API People, Inc. is an equal opportunity employer and encourages applicants from all backgrounds to apply.

title: Project Manager
description:
Job Title: Project Manager

Location: Remote (EST Time zone)

Salary Range: up to 2500 USD

Work Schedule: Monday to Friday, 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM (EST)


NOTE: INDEPENDENT CONTRACTOR POSITION


Company Overview:

Sagan is an exclusive membership community for top executives, founders, and CEOs seeking to hire and maximize the impact of international talent. We bridge the gap between global talent and US-based businesses, connecting candidates from vibrant regions like Latin America, the Philippines, India, Pakistan, Bangladesh, and Africa with leading American companies. Discover a world of career possibilities with Sagan.


Client Overview:

Sagan represents a leading signage company known for its innovative solutions and excellent customer service. We are currently seeking a skilled and dedicated Project Manager to support our high-level salesperson and ensure the successful execution of our projects.


Position Overview:

As a Project Operations Manager, you will play a crucial role in providing administrative support to our sales team. This role requires strong organizational skills, attention to detail, and effective communication abilities. You will assist in coordinating sales activities, managing client interactions, and ensuring smooth operations within the sales department.


Key Responsibilities:

- Manage and coordinate all phases of signage projects, ensuring on-time delivery within scope and budget.

-Collaborate with the sales team to understand client requirements and project specifications.

-Develop detailed project plans, timelines, and budgets.

-Communicate effectively with clients to provide updates and ensure satisfaction.

-Use project management tools like Corebridge, Monday, Slack, Trello, and Hubspot for task management and progress tracking.

-Coordinate with the production team to ensure accurate and timely delivery.

-Monitor project performance and identify areas for improvement.

-Prepare and present project reports to stakeholders.

-Maintain organized project documentation.


Requirements:

-Proven experience as a Project Manager in signage or related industry.

-Mid-level experience (3-5 years).High proficiency in English.

-Strong organizational and multitasking skills.

-Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities.

-Proficiency in Google Suite, Corebridge, Monday, Slack, Trello, and Hubspot.


Preferred Qualifications:

-Experience with international teams and clients.

-Familiarity with signage production processes and materials.

-Background in sales support or customer service.

-Experience in construction or architecture.

title: PHP Developer
description:

Come be Magenta!

title: Mobile Engineer Pleno
description:
Sobre a Avenue

Na Avenue, estamos em uma missão de oferecer as melhores plataformas e experiências para nossos clientes. Nosso time de tecnologia é essencial para que possamos continuar expandindo e inovando nossos produtos, sempre com o foco em qualidade e inovação. Buscamos pessoas desenvolvedoras apaixonadas por tecnologia que desejam contribuir diretamente com a transformação digital. Como será seu dia a dia?


No seu dia a dia, você terá como responsabilidade:

  • Desenvolver novas funcionalidades e integrações para nossa aplicação Flutter;
  • Colaborar com o time para identificar e implementar melhorias nos produtos e na experiência do usuário;
  • Garantir a qualidade do código, seguindo as melhores práticas de desenvolvimento (vamos sempre elevar a barra!);
  • Participar do nosso processo de trem release , liderando a publicação dos aplicativos;
  • Implementar soluções escaláveis, performáticas e modulares;
  • Monitorar e corrigir problemas para garantir a estabilidade das aplicações;
  • Analisar métricas e relatórios de desempenho, usando ferramentas como Firebase Analytics e Crashlytics .


Requisitos Obrigatórios:

Para se encaixar na posição, buscamos alguém com experiência e conhecimento nos seguintes pontos:

  • Experiência prática com Flutter no desenvolvimento de aplicativos móveis;
  • Conhecimento avançado em:
  • Clean Architecture ;
  • Princípios S.O.L.I.D ;
  • Clean Code ;
  • Padrões de Design (Strategy, Adapter, Decorator, etc.);
  • Programação Orientada a Objetos (POO) .
  • Experiência com testes unitários e Widget Tests ;
  • Vivência no processo de publicação de aplicativos e liderança de releases ;


Conhecimento sólido em:

  • Firebase (Analytics, Crashlytics);
  • Uso de Feature Flags ;
  • Manipulação de streams com RxDart ;
  • Trabalho com Git , colaborando através de Code Reviews ;
  • Gerenciamento de estado com Cubit/BLoC .
  • Habilidades interpessoais indispensáveis:
  • Resolução de problemas;
  • Colaboração com a equipe;
  • Boas habilidades de comunicação;
  • Dedicação ao aprendizado contínuo e desenvolvimento profissional.


Diferenciais:

Não é obrigatório, mas seria incrível se você também possuir:

  • Experiência com CI/CD ;
  • Prática em modularização de projetos ;
  • Conhecimento sobre concorrência/paralelismo ;
  • Habilidade para debugging e análise de performance (ex.: Flutter DevTools);
  • Experiência em testes A/B ;
  • Vivência em desenvolvimento nativo de aplicativos Android (Kotlin) e/ou iOS (Swift) .


BENEFÍCIOS DE SER UM COLABORADOR AVENUE

  • Regime CLT;
  • Vale refeição e vale alimentação atrativos;
  • Plano de saúde médico e odontológico;
  • Seguro de vida;
  • Wellhub ou TotalPass;
  • Auxílio Home office (Política de work anywhere);
  • Vale cadeira (Pra deixar seu setup top ;P);
  • Equipamentos disponibilizados (Mac ou Dell);
  • Incentivo educacional (reembolso para cursos, certificações e eventos);
  • Bônus semestral (conforme regras formuladas pela Avenue);
  • 24 corretagens grátis e 50 operações com desconto no câmbio para operações de investimento no app da Avenue;
  • USD 100,00 depositados no primeiro salário para abrir sua conta na Avenue e começar a investir!

title: Software Engineer Specialist
description:
This is an exciting opportunity to join Magalu Cloud as a Software Engineer focused on Software Defined Storage (SDS). We are building an organization that will be at the center of excellence for distributed technologies, and we are building it in Brasil! With Open Source at the heart of our solutions, we are tackling some of the greatest challenges in cloud computing and we’d like you to be part of it.

This is a key role in our SDS team, responsible for storage solutions offered by our platforms to our end users. A perfect candidate will never be content with today’s solution and would always look at how to improve the product and move the bar higher.


Responsibilities


  • Design and develop distributed SDS solutions
  • Lead and mentor junior engineers in the team
  • Collaborate with other teams to continuously improve product’s performance
  • Actively participate in upstream communities for the benefit of our organization and community itself
  • Provide bugfixes and improvements in the software, by working with other teams in the organization and wider Open Source community
  • Provide guidance and knowledge transfer to teams operating SDS product
  • Work with junior team members when building documentation for the product


Requirements


  • Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Computer/Electrical Engineering or related field, or proven equivalent professional experience. Experience must be in software development and/or distributed software maintenance
  • Experience as a software engineer
  • Experience working on Ceph based solutions
  • Understanding of various storage offerings; block, object, filesystem
  • Familiarity with OpenStack, Incus or LXD
  • Familiarity with Linux storage layer (VFS, block layer, device mapper)
  • Experience with Linux development, including debugging in the kernel and userspace
  • Experience in any two of these programing languages: C/C++, Python, Golang, Rust
  • Good written and verbal communication skills in Portuguese and English languages
  • Ability to work within the team, but also individually on dedicated tasks

How to stand out

  • Upstream patches in Ceph, Linux, OpenStack, Incus or LXD
  • Experience in building storage solutions for end users


Please remember to attach your CV in English for this position.

title: QA Automation Engineer II – Test Automation
description:
InComm is a global leader in the payments industry with over 30 years of experience and a presence in 30+ countries. As pioneers in gift cards, we hold two-thirds of the global market share. Our mission is to revolutionize global commerce through innovative payment technologies for retailers, brands, and consumers. ✨


We're looking for a passionate Software Engineer in Test to join our dynamic team. In this role, you'll focus on building automated testing solutions in a fast-paced Agile environment, contributing to both Front-end and Back-end systems. Your work will drive the implementation of cutting-edge testing strategies across dev, test, UAT, and production environments.


What You’ll Do:

  • Develop and maintain automated test scripts for regression testing.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional product teams in an Agile setting.
  • Enhance and integrate UI and API automation frameworks.
  • Become a subject matter expert in system architecture.
  • Create comprehensive test coverage plans to mitigate risks.
  • Participate in Agile ceremonies like stand-ups and sprint planning.
  • Conduct exploratory testing to identify vulnerabilities.
  • Troubleshoot and resolve issues with detailed bug reports.
  • Continuously drive improvements within the team and organization.


What You Bring:

  • +4 years of experience in QA automation (Java, Selenium, Jenkins ).
  • SQL experience and training in rapid software testing.
  • Strong analytical skills to identify key system issues.
  • A degree in Computer Science or related fields.
  • Experience in Agile development environments.
  • Great communication and a collaborative mindset.

title: Senior Web Designer
description:
We are first and foremost a great team full of ambitious and proactive individuals whose goal is to become the best professionals they can be and make Digital Silk a globally renowned digital agency. Our quest for excellence has resulted in our company’s growth and continuous need for outstanding team members.


We’re currently looking for a Senior Web Designer with a strong background in digital marketing design, UX, and UI , and the mindset to thrive in a fast-paced agency environment.


Digital Silk is built upon the principles of self-betterment, excellence, proactivity, and teamwork. If you share our passion and values, and want to be challenged and thrive in your career, then you’ll fit right in.


We are seeking senior-level candidates and offer competitive starting compensation and guaranteed raises, plus ownership in our company.


This is for a full-time, remote-work-at-home position as our headquarters are in the US. We do require team members to work 8am to 5pm EST (with breaks) as our clients are in the US.


What we offer at Digital Silk:


  • A work culture focused on mutual success and continuous growth
  • Competitive pay and scheduled yearly raises
  • Shares in the company – share in profit upon company sale
  • Challenging projects and opportunity to work with great team members
  • Job stability in case of illness, Covid changes, and personal problems
  • Work-from-home opportunity
  • 4 weeks paid time off


Responsibilities :


  • Design websites (primarily) and landing pages (occasionally)
  • Produce high-quality visuals for various digital campaigns
  • Create on-brand, compelling designs aligned with strategy and messaging
  • Present creative concepts clearly to internal and external stakeholders
  • Collaborate with marketing and research teams to elevate UX/UI
  • Handle multiple projects with focus, creativity, and consistency


Requirements:


  • 8+ years of professional design experience
  • A diverse portfolio showcasing strong web and marketing design work
  • Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite and Figma
  • A sharp eye for design, layout, and usability best practices
  • Clear communication skills in English
  • Ability to present ideas effectively to both team members and clients
  • Team spirit, organization, and a proactive attitude


We are a growing digital agency and are seeking to make IMMEDIATE hires.


Recruitment steps:


  • Apply via LinkedIn
  • Receive a short questionnaire
  • Send back your answers + CV (in English)
  • Quick intro call with our Recruitment Director
  • Interview with our Head of Design
  • Receive feedback

We kindly ask for your CV and all correspondence to be in English.

title: Engenheiro de software
description:
Junte-se à Barte e Redefina o Futuro dos Pagamentos B2B no Brasil!


Na Barte, não somos apenas uma fintech; somos arquitetos da inovação  e desbravadores no universo dos pagamentos B2B. Imagine um mundo onde o departamento financeiro opera com fluidez, sem burocracia e com total autonomia. title: Personalized Internet Assessor (Portuguese Speaker)
description:
Looking for a freelance opportunity where you can make an impact on technology from the comfort of your home? If you are dynamic, tech-savvy, and always online to learn more, this part-time, flexible project is the perfect fit for you!


A Day in the Life of a Personalized Internet Assessor:

  • In this role, you’ll be analyzing and providing feedback on texts, pages, images, and other types of information for top search engines, using an online tool
  • Through reviewing and rating search results for relevance and quality, you’ll be helping to improve the overall user experience for millions of search engine users, including yourself.


Join our team today and start putting your skills to work for one of the world's leading search engines.


The estimated hourly earnings for this role are 5.00 USD per hour. Payment is based on completed tasks, with the potential for higher earnings based on productivity.


TELUS Digital AI Community

Our global AI Community is a vibrant network of 1 million+ contributors from diverse backgrounds who help our customers collect, enhance, train, translate, and localize content to build better AI models. Become part of our growing community and make an impact supporting the machine learning models of some of the world’s largest brands.


Qualification path


No previous professional experience is required to apply to this role, however, working on this project will require you to pass the basic requirements and go through a standard assessment process. This is a part-time long-term project and your work will be subject to our standard quality assurance checks during the term of this agreement.


Basic Requirements

  • Working as a freelancer with excellent communication skills in Portuguese
  • Being a resident in Brazil for the last 5 consecutive years and having familiarity with current and historical business, media, sport, news, social media, and cultural affairs in Brazil
  • Active use of Gmail, Google+, and other forms of social media and experience in the use of web browsers to navigate and interact with a variety of content
  • Daily access to a broadband internet connection, a smartphone (Android 5.0, iOS 14 or higher), and a personal computer to work on.


Assessment

In order to be hired into the program, you’ll take a language assessment and an open book qualification exam that will determine your suitability for the position and complete ID verification. Don’t worry, our team will provide you with guidelines and learning materials before your exam. You will be required to complete the exam in a specific timeframe but at your convenience!


Equal Opportunity

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for a contractual relationship without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or protected veteran status. At TELUS Digital AI, we are proud to offer equal opportunities and are committed to creating a diverse and inclusive community. All aspects of selection are based on applicants’ qualifications, merits, competence, and performance without regard to any characteristic related to diversity.

title: WordPress Developer – Brazil (Remote) | International Digital Projects
description:
Are you an experienced WordPress Developer ready to take on exciting international projects? Remote People is partnering with a renowned global digital solutions provider to recruit a talented WordPress Developer for their expanding team in Brazil!


Our client is a leading digital solutions company with over 20 years of experience delivering innovative web and technology projects for top-tier clients across finance, retail, hospitality, and more. They are known for their collaborative, multicultural work environment and commitment to excellence.


As a WordPress Developer, you’ll play a key role in building and maintaining custom WordPress solutions for high-impact, international projects. You’ll work closely with a project manager based in France and collaborate daily with a dynamic, global team.


Key Responsibilities:


  • Develop custom WordPress themes and plugins from scratch
  • Convert design mockups (Figma, Adobe XD, etc.) into responsive, high-performance websites
  • Optimize websites for speed, security, and scalability
  • Troubleshoot, debug, and maintain multiple WordPress sites
  • Collaborate using tools like Slack, ClickUp, and Notion
  • Manage local, staging, and production environments


Your Profile:


  • 5–8 years of professional WordPress development experience
  • Advanced skills in PHP, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and MySQL
  • Deep knowledge of the WordPress ecosystem (custom post types, hooks, filters, ACF, WP-CLI, etc.)
  • Proven ability to develop custom plugins/themes without page builders
  • Experience with technical SEO, performance, and security best practices
  • Proficient with Git and version control
  • Highly autonomous, organized, and fluent in English (French is a plus)


What’s Offered:

  • Supportive, expert team and a collaborative, innovative culture


Interested in joining a forward-thinking company and making your mark on global digital

projects? Apply now and let’s connect!

title: C++ Developer – Equities E-Trading
description:
FCamara is seeking a highly skilled C++ Developer to join our client's Electronic Equities team within the Corporate & Institutional Banking (CIB) division. This is a unique opportunity to work on a cutting-edge ultra-low latency algorithmic trading platform used across global financial markets.


Professionals based in Portugal and Brazil are encouraged to apply. Relocation to Portugal is mandatory for this role and will be fully supported by FCamara as part of our mobility package.


About the Role

As a C++ Developer, you will:

  • Design and develop high-performance components for our eTrading platform;
  • Collaborate with global teams across London, New York, Hong Kong, and Tokyo;
  • Work on greenfield projects involving algorithmic models, market data distribution, and exchange connectivity;
  • Leverage the latest C++ standards (C++17/20/23) and advanced system-level programming techniques.


What We’re Looking For

  • Strong hands-on experience with modern C++ (14/17/20/23);
  • Deep understanding of multi-threading , data structures , and algorithm complexity;
  • Proficiency in Linux , gcc , gdb , Boost , and STL;
  • Experience with OO design and working in globally distributed teams;
  • Fluent in English (written and spoken).


Nice to Have

  • Expertise in performance-tuned networking , memory management , and Unix scripting (bash, Python);
  • Familiarity with FIX protocol or other financial protocols;
  • Knowledge of Java or C# is a plus.


Why Join Us?

  • Be part of a global leader in capital markets and institutional banking;
  • Work on innovative, high-impact projects in a fast-paced environment;
  • Collaborate with top-tier professionals and access the best hardware and software technologies;
  • Enjoy a flexible work location in Lisbon or Porto with global exposure.

title: Supply Chain Analyst - Remote
description:
Recognized as the leading software development company in the Americas, our client offers 100% remote modality and an excellent work environment where employees can thrive, and work in multicultural teams, with flexible schedules and endless growth opportunities.


About the Role:


We are looking for a Supply Chain Analyst to join our team and help drive our growth. As a Supply Chain Analyst, you will play a critical and active role in the day-to-day operations. This is an excellent opportunity to be one of the key members of our team and position yourself for unique career growth opportunities.

What You’ll Do:


- Determine supply needs for products and services and research potential suppliers.

- Act as a link and communicate pricing and performance needs to vendors and suppliers.

- Participate in negotiations of favorable procurement contracts and prices with selected vendors and suppliers.

- Select the most suitable suppliers in terms of reliability, product quality, and cost-efficiency.

- Maintain and update a list of suppliers and their qualifications, delivery times, and potential future development.

- Prepare cost-benefit analysis reports for review by managers.




Here’s what we are looking for:


- 2+ years experience in a supply management role or related position.

- Knowledge of SAP or SAP B1.

- Degree in supply chain management, logistics, business management, or related fields.

- Experience in managing inventory.

- SQL analysis tools and mathematical analysis.

- Interpersonal skills and ability to build and improve trust.

- Advanced English level.


Benefits:


- 100% remote work.

- Flexible hours - make your own schedule!

- Diverse and multicultural work environment.

- Paid parental leave, vacation & holidays.

- Hardware setup for you to work from home.

- Excellent compensation — well above the market average.

- Extensive opportunities for growth and professional development thanks to our mentoring system.


Enjoy the opportunity to have a dynamic lifestyle, better health, and wellness. Find renewed passion in your job, improve your productivity, and benefit from attractive growth opportunities for your career.


If you are interested in being part of a team composed of the best professionals and working 100% goal-oriented in an innovative environment, but with the structure and resources of a multinational market leader, do not hesitate to apply!

title: Talent Acquisition
description:
At Blueground , our vision is to make people feel at home wherever they choose to live. For us, that means ensuring our guests have the peace of mind, flexibility & confidence they need to explore life’s latest adventure.


We are looking for a Talent Acquisition Specialist to join our People team and help us attract and develop top talent across USA. You will focus on bringing on-board amazing people that will love our culture and embrace our values. If you are a target-driven professional, who has a passion for attracting great talent and creating an exceptional candidate experience, this is an opportunity to drive your career forward! As a Blueground talent scout, you will manage the recruitment process from end to end and collaborate with our leadership team to bring on board amazing people.

What you will focus on:

  • Sourcing - be an expert in sourcing hard-to-fill positions and finding the best talent in PropTech through using innovative sourcing methods including utilizing an agile sourcing methodology across USA
  • Proactive Talent Pooling - build diverse talent pools through effective targeting and talent pipelining of both passive and active candidates. You will be responsible for actively overseeing regular and accurate updates of our global job adverts, external jobs boards, recruitment networking and the promotion of our refer a friend scheme; keeping D&I in mind through every part of the Talent Attraction process.
  • Be a Blueground Ambassador - Get people excited about Blueground and match great talent to great opportunities. You will often be the first person that someone talks to from Blueground, so you need to be great at understanding what motivates them and match their motivations with the many benefits of working here.
  • Collaborative Hiring Process - Coordinate and schedule interviews with hiring managers and relevant stakeholders, ensuring a seamless interview process for candidates. Facilitate candidate feedback sessions and debrief meetings to gather input and make informed hiring decisions. Work closely with HR teams to manage offer negotiations, pre-employment checks, and onboarding processes.
  • Candidate Relationship Management - Serve as the primary point of contact for candidates throughout the recruitment process, providing timely communication and guidance. Ensure a positive candidate experience by delivering clear and transparent communication, managing expectations, and providing feedback. Build and maintain relationships with candidates to create a pipeline of talent for current and future hiring needs.

What we are looking for:

  • 2+ years of experience with hiring process;
  • Knowledge and experience of online sourcing including social/professional networking (e.g. LinkedIn Recruiter).
  • Candidate experience focused, passionate about employer branding and being creative in our approach to sourcing talent.
  • Excellent organizational and prioritization skills, tenacious, personable and articulate.
  • Advanced English
  • Ability to establish trusted relationships with management, candidates and external partners.
  • Positive attitude combined with a desire to make work fun.
  • A team player that will fit with our values and add to our culture.

title: SDR - Representante de desenvolvimento de vendas

Estamos em busca de um SDR (Sales Development Representative)  para integrar nossa equipe de forma remota, atuando no atendimento inicial de leads via WhatsApp e chamadas de vídeo. title: Windows System Administrator
description:
Overnight Shift: 11:00 PM to 8:00 AM EST


Job Summary:

Our client is seeking an experienced Windows Administrator to join their IT operations team during the overnight shift. The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience managing Windows environments, troubleshooting system and network issues, and administering core Microsoft infrastructure services.


Key Responsibilities:

  • Manage and maintain Active Directory, including user and group administration, OU structure, and permissions.
  • Configure, manage, and troubleshoot Windows-based services such as DNS, DHCP, DFS, and Group Policy Objects (GPOs).
  • Perform root-cause analysis and resolve issues related to authentication and system performance.
  • Diagnose and resolve connectivity issues within a Windows environment.
  • Collaborate with other IT teams to escalate and resolve complex technical problems as needed.
  • Maintain accurate documentation of system configurations and operational procedures.


Qualifications:

  • Proven experience in Windows system administration.
  • Strong knowledge of Active Directory and related services.
  • Proficiency in managing DNS, DHCP, DFS, and GPOs.
  • Solid troubleshooting skills for authentication and performance issues in Windows environments.
  • Basic understanding of TCP/IP networking, VLANs, and IP subnetting.
  • Ability to work independently during overnight hours with minimal supervision.
  • Good communication skills and a proactive attitude.


Preferred Qualifications (not required but a plus):

  • Microsoft certifications (e.g., MCSA, MSCE).
  • Experience with remote desktop support tools.
  • Familiarity with scripting and automation (PowerShell is a plus).

title: Profissional Fullstack Node e React - Pleno
description:
Sobre a vaga


Código da vaga: 47782


Sobre a BRQ Digital


Há 31 anos no mercado, a BRQ Digital Solutions se consolidou como uma das maiores empresas de transformação digital do país. Com uma plataforma de serviços end to end, oferecemos as mais eficientes e inovadoras soluções, tecnologias e metodologias, promovendo uma jornada de transformação para grandes marcas, de diferentes segmentos, no Brasil e no exterior.


Nossos 2.500 mil funcionários atuam no modelo de trabalho Anywhere Office e a empresa é destaque como um dos melhores lugares para trabalhar pelo GPTW e Glassdoor.


BRQ WAY


No nosso BRQ WAY temos a missão de conectar, transformar e empoderar cada um dos nossos profissionais, que por aqui são chamados de feras, para que todos tenham a chance de usar sua paixão para transformar o mundo com tecnologia!


É isso que queremos, com nosso Programa de Diversidade e Inclusão trabalhamos com dois objetivos: equidade e inclusão, buscamos aumentar a participação dos grupos minoritários, quebrar os vieses inconscientes e expandir a conscientização sobre temas tão importantes para que todos sejam livres para serem quem são.


Vamos transformar juntos! Vem ser fera com a gente.


  • Ei #fera em Node e React, chegou o momento de encarar um novo desafio em sua carreira! Venha ser um #ferabrq


- O que procuramos?


Buscamos um #fera com espírito empreendedor e que sabe que é o verdadeiro protagonista do seu sucesso! Queremos em nosso time pessoas motivadas por desafios, constante evolução e, claro, que são apaixonadas por tecnologia e transformação!


- O que você deve ter?


  • Experiência com ReactJS
  • Experiência com NodeJS
  • Integração com APIs RESTful
  • Conhecimento em integração com CRMs
  • Inglês avançado (comunicação com o time da França)


- O que temos pra te oferecer?


Mais do que um plano de carreira !


A BRQ acredita que cada fera deve ser protagonista do seu crescimento, tendo autonomia para criar seu próprio plano de desenvolvimento profissional. Nosso plano de carreira é dividido em 4 pilares:


Carreira técnica: Você pode seguir a trilha de crescimento técnico, se o seu objetivo for se desenvolver cada vez mais em diferentes tecnologias. Oferecemos diversos treinamentos!


Carreira de Liderança: Você pode seguir a trilha e se tornar um líder, desenvolver pessoas, auxiliar na evolução profissional e pessoal e estimular o crescimento para o surgimento de novos talentos.


Experiência internacional: Estamos crescendo cada vez mais fora do Brasil e você tem possibilidade de atuar em projetos para outros países, ou diretamente nos países onde a BRQ tem sede.


Empreendedorismo: De funcionário para sócio! Temos o Innovation Hub, a Corporate Venture que investe em ideias de profissionais que tenham sinergia com nosso negócio.


- E os benefícios?


Plano de Saúde; Plano Odontológico; Seguro de Vida; Vale Refeição; Vale Alimentação; Horário Flexível; Gympass, Telemedicina, Telenutrição, Canal de suporte emocional 24h e muito mais!


- Como é trabalhar na BRQ?


Temos um clima descontraído, diversos programas e eventos internos. Adoramos comemorar! E fazemos isso muito bem! Veja aqui no Youtube: youtube.com/brqdigitalsolutions


Curtiu? Então inscreva-se e venha para o melhor da Transformação Digital com a gente!

title: Lider Técnico (Dev/Int) CPI
description:
CONTRATAÇÃO: CLT


Na TIVIT, transformação digital é o que nos move . Estamos em busca de uma pessoa Líder Técnica (Dev/Int) com sólida experiência em desenvolvimento e integração SAP, para atuar com SAP BTP Integration Suite (CPI) em projetos estratégicos, liderando entregas de alta qualidade, alinhadas às necessidades de negócio dos nossos clientes.

Requisitos e qualificações

Obrigatórios:

  • Profundo conhecimento em SAP BTP Integration Suite: Cloud Integration (CPI) ;
  • Profunda experiência com SAP ABAP .


Desejáveis:

Diferenciais:

  • Experiência em desenvolvimentos SAP Workflow ;
  • Conhecimentos em SAP Fiori (SAPUI5) ;
  • Experiência com SAP ABAP utilizando BOPF ;
  • Conhecimento em SAP ABAP para o módulo SAP HCM .
